import React ,{useState} from "react"; import { Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { Scrollchor } from 'react-scrollchor'; const Nav = () => { const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const showSidenav = () =>{ setClick(!false) } return (

QuestPaper
  • Home
  • A propos
  • Nos Services
  • Contact
  • Se Connecter
); }; export default Nav;
